entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1 with temperature rising to 6 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 after midnight then increasing to 60 gusting to 80. Low plus 1 with temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late in the morning. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
